casebody.data:
McCORMICK
v.
HANSON AGGREGATES SE, INC. No. 304P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 20, 2004. Dorothy K. Leapley, Daniel F. McLawhorn, Associate City Attorneys, for Thomas A. McCormick. A. Lee Hogewood, Raleigh, for Hanson Aggregates Southeast. Leslie Winner, Charlotte, for UNC Board of Governors. Andrew L. Romanet, Jr., Raleigh, for N.C. League of Municipalities. James B. Blackburn, for N.C. Ass'n. of Co. Commissioners. Alison Schafer, for N.C. School Bds. Assoc. Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Solicitor General, Grayson G. Kelley, Chief Deputy Attorney General, for State. J. Nicholas Ellis, Rocky Mount, James P. Cauley, III, Wilson, for N.C. Assoc. of Defense Attys.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of July 2004 by North Carolina State Bar for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot. By order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of August 2004."
